reviews.review: spoko giera polecam kazdemu only prime
Gran juego, horas y horas de diversión. Pero necesitas de paciencia y muchas horas si en realidad quieres mejorar en este juego.

This game is honestly trash, I have played 600 hours of this game to only have nothing but rage and sadness go through my mind as I was playing it. The rank system is trash, I have played this game for 600 hours and have still not had that chance to get out of sliver, and only time that I was in gold nova was when I was playing wingman with my friends. The AWP is too overpowered it should have 5 rounds in a mag instead of 10 to balance it out better. The auto snipers are only really ever used by people who don't really know what they're doing or they're used by some hacker who can shoot you from the other side of the map. Most of the players that I have talked to are either very toxic or they're stuck in sliver to the point where they don't really seem to care about the game at all. The only way that I would even consider ever really playing this game with any good reason is if the rank system was reworked and you were actually able to see where you are and how much more games you would have to play in order to rank up to the next rank. Please valve fix your game.

Sehr gutes Spiel.
Grafik zwar nicht zu vergleichen mit neueren Spielen der CoD-Reihe, jedoch somit kompatibel für geringere Rechnerkapazität. Auch das Spieleerlebnis bleibt durch Vielseitigkeit lange erhalten, so sind 1000 Spielstunden nicht einmal so schwer zu erreichen.
Alles in allem ein Spiel mit extremem Spaßfaktor
